Package controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controllers.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is GameController.java, this is where all in-game procedures take place e.g. drawing game, updating tick and overall where the game is played and displayed to the player. Menu icons created by group

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This runs as soon as the scene is loaded, it simply sets all placeholder values and properties to the fxml controls and also loads the current level into a canvas and starts ticker.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - url of resources.
      resourceBundle - bundle of resources.

    • onActions

      private void onActions()
      Adds listeners to each fxml control and when clicked perform set action.

    • move

      private static void move(Rat rat)
      Moves the set rat.
      Parameters:
      rat - the rat in which is to be moved.

    • tick

      private static void tick() throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, LineUnavailableException, IOException
      This method basically runs all relevant methods to each entity, for instance will move all rats and activate each item.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - the unsupported audio file exception
      LineUnavailableException - the line unavailable exception
      IOException - the io exception

    • draw

      private static void draw()
      This method just gathers the new game state and draws it to the canvas.
